alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 2:55AM MST until February 23 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
